column4: hi, how to know what is my default playback device. festival is givin me this error... Linux: can't open /dev/dsp
actually there is a device in /dev as /dev/adsp but how to specify it to festival?
Festival has a configuration file. Maybe you can set it there. I can't find the documentation at present.
at ubuntuforum i got the solution.... i need alsa-oss and oss-compat
